pullrequest.title: Added an IndexedMzML class to make random access of indexed MzML documents possible.

content.raw:
A cursory look at the memory occupied by the Python process suggests that the memory savings are indeed more significant.

I guess one thing we could add is to suppress building the old ID cache in the IndexedXML constructor, since it is not going to be used by the overridden `get_by_id`.
I did that in the latest commit. If everything looks OK to you, I am going to accept the PR. Thank you very much for this contribution.
content.html:
A cursory look at the memory occupied by the Python process suggests that the memory savings are indeed more significant.

I guess one thing we could add is to suppress building the old ID cache in the IndexedXML constructor, since it is not going to be used by the overridden get_by_id. I did that in the latest commit. If everything looks OK to you, I am going to accept the PR. Thank you very much for this contribution.
